ch0101_41_mei/0101_0701_01_10:
I always feel great when I’m with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0101_41_mei/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s enjoy ourselves to the fullest and raise
everyone’s spirits!
ch0101_41_mei/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m planning to show my passion for Pasio to
tourists by showing them all the things I like
most here!
ch0101_41_mei/7101_0701_02_10: I’m sure it’ll work out great! Just leave it to me!
ch0101_41_mei/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m going to do my very best at being a super
tourism ambassador!
ch0101_41_mei/7102_0701_01_10:
What do you think of these clothes? Do I look like
a tour guide?
ch0101_41_mei/7102_0701_02_10:
Welcome, everyone! This is Pasio, the artificial
island full of nature!
ch0101_41_mei/7102_0701_03_10: Just fooling! I was trying out my tour guide voice.
ch0101_41_mei/7103_0701_01_10:
I was writing up a list of spots on Pasio that I
particularly want to show off...
ch0101_41_mei/7103_0701_02_10:
There were so many spots I wanted to include,
I was able to fill up the list in no time!
ch0101_41_mei/7103_0701_03_10:
I’ve included everything from really popular spots
to niche locations only insiders know about.
ch0101_41_mei/7104_0701_01_10:
Shaymin seems really enthusiastic about our
tourism ambassador gig!
ch0101_41_mei/7104_0701_02_10:
Shaymin and I are going to do our best to provide
tourists with the best possible service.
ch0101_41_mei/7104_0701_03_10: Just watch—soon smiles will be blooming all over!
ch0101_41_mei/7105_0701_01_10:
Whether you want to relax or play to your heart’s
content, just let me know!
ch0101_41_mei/7105_0701_02_10: I’ll take you to a secret spot only I know about!
ch0101_41_mei/1701_0701_01_10:
I found this while I was scouting around for
potential tourist attractions.
ch0101_41_mei/1701_0702_01_10:
When you’re walking around so many places,
you never know when you might come across
something nice!
ch0101_41_mei/2501_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Shaymin actually has
another form?
ch0101_41_mei/2501_0701_02_10:
Both of Shaymin’s forms are cute but in
different ways...
ch0101_41_mei/2501_0701_03_10:
As Shaymin’s partner, I get the privilege of seeing
both forms whenever I want!
ch0101_41_mei/2501_0702_01_10:
Do you also have a version of yourself you don’t
usually reveal?
ch0101_41_mei/2501_0702_02_10:
If you do, I need to stay by your side! I wouldn’t
want to miss it!
ch0101_41_mei/2511_0701_01_10:
Since I’ve started working as a tourism
ambassador, I’ve realized something.
ch0101_41_mei/2511_0701_02_10:
Whenever you notice you’re feeling happy or
grateful, you should always make a point to
share it!
ch0101_41_mei/2511_0701_03_10: So here I go! Thanks for always being by my side!
ch0101_41_mei/2511_0702_01_10:
Of course, being appreciated by others is
great too!
ch0101_41_mei/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m going to do my best so others and I can keep
sharing our appreciation!
ch0101_41_mei/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Let’s make sure we put today to
good use!
ch0101_41_mei/3003_0701_01_10:
Oh man, I’m itching to get out there and battle!
So, when are we going? Now?
ch0101_41_mei/3005_0701_01_10:
Whoa, look at the time! We should go to sleep
soon so we’re not tired tomorrow!
